tool_description: Filters and anonymizes location data to ensure compliance with privacy regulations and user consent requirements.

location_data.description: Array of location data to filter and anonymize

privacy_level.description: Privacy protection level: basic, standard, or strict

anonymization_method.description: Anonymization approach: spatial_cloaking, k_anonymity, or differential_privacy

minimum_k_value.description: Minimum k-anonymity value for privacy protection (2-100)

error_messages: Missing location data: Provide location data array for privacy filtering.
Invalid privacy level: Use one of [basic, standard, strict].
Unsupported anonymization method: Use one of [spatial_cloaking, k_anonymity, differential_privacy].
Invalid k-anonymity value: Set minimum_k_value between 2 and 100.
usage: Provide location_data array; optionally set privacy_level, anonymization_method, and minimum_k_value. Returns privacy-compliant filtered location data.

filtered_count.description: Number of data points after privacy filtering
